Name: Mango
Description: Juicy, fragrant, and irresistibly sweet, our mangoes are the epitome of tropical indulgence. Handpicked at peak ripeness, they boast a vibrant golden-yellow hue and a luscious, velvety texture. Perfect for smoothies, desserts, or as a refreshing snack, these mangoes are rich in vitamins A and C, making them a deliciously healthy choice.

Name: Banana
Description: The banana is a tropical fruit known for its elongated, curved shape and creamy, sweet flesh. It has a smooth, yellow skin when ripe, though unripe bananas are green, and some varieties may appear red or purple. Bananas are a staple food in many cultures, versatile for cooking, and are consumed raw as a quick and nutritious snack.

Name: Apple
Description: The apple is a popular, versatile fruit that comes in various colors, flavors, and textures. It is round or slightly oval-shaped and grows on deciduous apple trees. Apples are a staple fruit in many cuisines and are enjoyed raw or used in countless recipes.
